name: Playwright Chrome Browser
description: Enable browser automation capabilities using Playwright MCP server. This allows agents to interact with web pages, take screenshots, fill forms, and perform automated browser tasks through the Playwright automation framework.

notices.title: Playwright MCP Required
notices.message: This skill requires the Playwright MCP server to be installed in Claude Code. Run: claude mcp add @anthropic/mcp-server-playwright

notices.title: Claude Code Runtime Only
notices.message: This skill is only available when using Claude Code as the AI runtime.

notices.title: Headless by Default
notices.message: Playwright runs in headless mode by default. The browser window is not visible during automation.
